overview:
William Klein is a CEO of Rival Theory with over 20 years of experience in software, and 10 years in the games industry. He received his PhD. in Artificial Intelligence from the University of New Mexico.

Dr. Klein founded Rival Theory Inc,a New Mexico corporation, in 2010 with Amanda Solosky, MBA. Rival Theory has developed a comprehensive Artificial Intelligence (AI) solution for the Video Game industry.

Over 300 studios are using Rival Theory’s products today. They’ve continued to build their technology over the last 18 months and now have a prototype and demo of a new artificial intelligence product called Sentio.
